title: Sales Associate (SDR) & Executive Assistant
job_overview:
Sales Associate (Remote – UK Timezones)

Join a fast-growing CFO advisory and tax consultancy helping entrepreneurs scale with confidence.

We’re GrowFactor — a modern accountancy and CFO advisory firm supporting business owners in the UK and Dubai. We partner with founders, tax-savvy entrepreneurs, and ambitious companies looking to scale smartly and reduce tax risk.

We’re growing fast and need a reliable, organised, and proactive Sales Associate to support our CEO in qualifying inbound leads, following up with prospects, and helping more business owners benefit from our expertise.

?

???? What You’ll Do
 • Be the first point of contact for inbound leads from our referral partners and marketing channels
 • Pre-qualify leads using our framework and assess fit before CEO involvement
 • Book calls using our calendar system and ensure pre-call forms are completed
 • Join Zoom calls to take notes, manage follow-ups, and draft proposal outlines
 • Send proposals using templates and manage CRM updates
 • Own follow-up process (email + phone + CRM reminders) to move leads through the pipeline
 • Track performance of outreach and suggest improvements to copy/process

Support the CEO with light executive assistant tasks — including inbox management, meeting scheduling, CRM hygiene, and follow-ups

 • Act as the central point of contact for new and existing referral partners
 • Track all referrals to and from our business and ensure timely updates, status reports, and thank-you follow-ups
 • Maintain a high standard of communication and trust on behalf of the CEO with both leads and partners

?

???? Who You Are
 • Detail-oriented, responsive, and highly organised
 • Confident on email and Zoom — you can build rapport and ask smart questions
 • Comfortable working with senior entrepreneurs and advisors
 • Proactive, a self-starter, and not afraid to chase up leads or take ownership
 • Experienced in B2B sales support, account management, or customer success

Trustworthy and reliable with access to sensitive client and partner information

 • Proactive in managing tasks, chasing updates, and anticipating next steps
 • Comfortable in a fast-moving founder-led environment where priorities can shift quickly


?

???? Bonus Points If You Have
 • Experience with GoHighLevel, or other CRM tools
 • Familiarity with tax, accountancy, or financial services (not essential)
 • Based in a UK-friendly timezone (PH with flexible hours)

?

???? What We Offer
 • Full-time flexibility — ideally 40 hours/week to start
 • Fully remote role with autonomy and trust
 • Training and mentoring from our founder/CEO
 • Opportunity to grow into a more senior sales or client-facing role
 • Be part of a high-performing, modern financial services team

?

? To Apply

****Send us a short video or Loom (under 3 minutes) explaining:*****
 • Why this role interests you
 • Your experience with lead qualification or sales support
 • Your timezone and availability

We’re looking to hire quickly — if you’re organised, reliable, and want to grow in a sales/advisory-led company, apply now.
